column1: '''''The Tolkien Diary 1992''''' is a blank diary featuring illustrations by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] (first published in ''[[Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien]]'') and many quotations (from ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'') and biographic details.

Except for the introduction,<ref>"[http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?topic_id=1533&forum=9&post_id=7943#forumpost7943 A Tolkien Book of Days]" at [http://www.tolkienguide.com/ Tolkien Collector's Guide] (accessed 31 May 2011)</ref> the diary was reprinted as ''[[A Tolkien Book of Days]]'' (HarperCollins 1996).
